entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quick Actions and Refactorings: "Add parameter to constructor" in partial class replaces current file content with the file containing the constructor #59292
  • False code suggestion for a not existing Problem #59291
  • C# interactive has problems with `switch` expression with `var` #59290
  • Quick Actions "Use pattern matching" after #endif directive adds extra #endif #59289
  • IDE0062 code fix (local function can be static) removes "unsafe" keyword #59286
  • DebugRoslynComponent cannot read config from csproj #59272
  • Make OptionKey serializable so that integration tests can pass it between processes #59267
  • [LSP] Experiment with LSP client on VSMac #59265
  • EnC: Allow signature changes and method/field/etc renames #59264
  • Consolidate data tracked over an async completion session #59262

Closed

  • Invalid "Add parameter" suggestion #35342
    Backlog
  • VisualBasicUseConditionalExpressionForAssignmentCodeRefactoringProvider STILL on Error #32087
    Backlog
  • Add `IOperation CreateLazyOperation(BoundExpression exprOpt)` helper method #26435
    Backlog
  • Implicit conversion from type annotated with InterpolatedStringHandler crashes compiler #58346
    17.1
  • Crash when casting to function pointer under specific circumstances #57994
    17.2
  • Control+, Go To Type show same info for partial class with certain filename. #31563
    Backlog
  • "Use pattern matching" isn't available in some trivial cases #31835
    Backlog
  • Double-clicking item in "Find all References" does not work if line is in a collapsed regaion #31856
    Backlog
  • CSharpMoveDeclarationNearReferenceCodeRefactoringProvider throw exceptions #30977
    Backlog
  • interface generation double bug #31112
    Backlog
  • Unable to decompile MemoryStream #31122
    Backlog
  • OverrideCompletion crashes IDE on property without accessors #30385
    Backlog
  • NavTo display string is wrong for VB generic methods #30457
    Backlog
  • VirtualChar system cannot handle 32bit wide characters #29174
    Backlog
  • C# Quick Actions doesn't work with Extension Methods with out parameters #28552
    Backlog
  • Incorrectly inserting using statements #25980
    Backlog
  • "Make field readonly" should be offered when taking readonly ref #26263
    Backlog
  • ReplacePropertyWithMethodsCodeRefactoringProvider encounted an error and has been disabled #24631
    Backlog
  • Incorrect behavior around directives for unused usings code fix when file only contains usings #1323
    Backlog
  • Intellisense suggests full type name when it is not necessary #17729
    Backlog
  • Block comment breaks when caret in /**/ and between */ and hit Enter #16417
    Backlog
  • Target typing for return #16952
    Backlog
  • SyntaxGenerator can't generate expression-bodied members #16953
    Backlog
  • Contextual keywords aren't escaped in symbol display strings. #13610
    Backlog
  • Using elivs operator lowers code coverage #14114
    Backlog
  • Offer to convert method calls with string and objects to interpolated strings #11759
    Backlog
  • #pragma warning disable IDE0002 does not disable graying out #12213
    Backlog
  • Syntax normalizer uses CRLF for EOL character by default #8537
    Backlog
  • Suspicious `string.Format` invocation in `IntHashTable` constructor #9171
    Backlog
  • Unable to remove trailing trivia on code blocks #7760
    Backlog
  • We don't handle a C# file in a VB project correctly #8048
    Backlog
  • Type Inferrer should use argument count and out/ref status to pick overload #5791
    Backlog
  • Comment selection on a line with a collapsed region should comment the whole region #5587
    Backlog
  • "Go To Definition" command places cursor at end of method name. #2021
    Backlog
  • Deprecate GetSymbolInfo and add identical but renamed GetReferencedSymbolInfo #3322
    Backlog
  • Avoid passing titles to INotificationService when redundant #3363
    Backlog
  • The name does not exist in the current context #59275
  • Suboptimal code is generated for evaluation of list patterns, could be an artifact of used subsumption checking strategy #57731
    C# 11.0
  • No Quick Info when hovering over methods or property during debugging #1446
    Backlog
  • Introduce constant copies trivia twice #1016
    Backlog
  • VB NavBar doesn't always navigate to first member in (especially in Metadata as source) #558
    Backlog
  • Incorrect diff when fix causes conflicts / warning annotations #475
    Backlog
  • IDE0072: False positive when using switch expression and pattern matching with "or" to default case #58468
    17.2
  • Conditional Return Expression #59268
  • Missing quick refactor action to convert event add/remove into expression body #59255

PullRequests

Created

  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure command handler doesn't index out of bounds when at end of file #59302
    Area-IDE
  • Cache the unescaped form of globalconfig section names #59301
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure we emit a reference-equality check against null when generating .Equals #59300
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid 0-length spans #59299
    Area-IDE
  • Prevent certain keywords from appearing in case clause #59298
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for unsafe local functions in IDE0062 code fix #59297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Improve loc string. #59296
    Area-IDE
  • Add test showing issue doesn't repro #59295
    Area-IDE
  • Cascade between position record parameters and properties. #59293
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for decoding required members in metadata #59288
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Insert release/dev17.2 branch to VS rel branch #59287
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix definite assignment crash with list-patterns #59285
    New Feature - List Patterns
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE
  • Fix DeclaringCompilation for source methods #59278
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix parameter completion for partially written lambdas #59277
    Area-IDE
  • Fix fading span for unnecessary using #59276
    Area-IDE
  • Associate module EnC diagnostics with changed documents #59273
    Area-Interactive, Approved to merge, 17.1
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [LSP] respect formatting options in snippets #59266
    Area-IDE, LSP

Merged

  • Don't show colon suffix in property pattern completion #59031
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59294
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Unskip TestSupportedDiagnosticsMessageHelpLinkUri #51882
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Bump MS.VS.RpcContract version #59284
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix remove-using when surrounded by pp directives in empty files #59282
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update integration test harness for 17.2 Preview 1 #59281
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59279
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Avoid eagerly calling SyntaxTreeOptionsProvider.IsGenerated #59244
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Support declaration and emit of `required` members in source #58507
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • List patterns: Recreate the decision dag for lowering #59019
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59280
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove a first chance exception for normal cancellation #58646
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix issue link #59158
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Snap config changes #59269
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert "Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project - take 2" #59242
    Area-IDE
  • Make CompletionOptions global #59117
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P1
  • Fix generate method in switch arms. #59261
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P1
  • Fix 'populate switch' to understand more possible user cases #59259
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P1
  • Support block/expression body preferences for event accessors #59256
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P1
  • Don't offer 'use not null' when inside an expression tree #59254
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P1

Updated

  • Fixed IDE0044 (Make Field Readonly) for DataMember fields in DataContract classes #43489
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Follow up on LDM decisions made 2022-01-26 #59229
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • Function pointer calling convention IDE support #59062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support multi-caret when inserting doc comments #54741
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Cover additional cases in implicit object creation analyzer #57679
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Handle more cases in both new line formatting and curly brace completion #53222
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove some outdated configurations in tools #52800
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Use constant interpolated string analyzer #51705
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • fix restore on nuget 6.2.0.33 #59230
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Go To Implementation show metadata results #59100
    Area-IDE
  • More fault handling cleanup #59097
    Area-IDE
  • Remove netstandard1.3 from code base #59177
    Area-Infrastructure
  • draft #58910
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Update breaking changes document for 17.0 struct initializer fixes #59245
    Area-Compilers
  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records
  • Update incremental generator docs #58344
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators
  • [semi-auto-props]: Avoid using `IsAutoProperty` when possible #59109
    Area-Compilers
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Make solution options global #59168
    Area-IDE
